name: AARAKOCRA AEROMANCER

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The aarakocra makes two Wind Staff attacks, and it can use Spellcasting to cast Gust of Wind.

actions.name: Wind Staff
actions.text: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Bludgeoning damage plus 11 (2d10) Lightning damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text: The aarakocra casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13): At Will: Elementalism, Gust of Wind, Mage Hand, Message 1/Day:

reactions.name: Feather Fall (1/Day)
reactions.text: The aarakocra casts Feather Fall in response to that spell's trigger, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.
